AccommodationsProfileLog.name: AccommodationsProfileLog

Announcements.description: The Announcements Brightspace Data Set returns details on the announcements a user has created for your org units.

AssignmentSpecialAccess.name: AssignmentSpecialAccess
AssignmentSpecialAccess.description: The Assignment Special Access Brightspace Data Set returns all applicable special access start, end, and due dates for each assignment in the organization.

columns.name: DropboxId
columns.description: Unique assignment identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Assignment special access availability start date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Assignment special access availability end date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: Assignment special access due date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who modified the assignment special access.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the special access was last modified for the assignment (UTC)

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if special access has been deleted.

columns.name: StartDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: Determines whether learners can view or access the assignment before the StartDate. See About Availability Type for details. No data available for assignments created before December 2022/20.22.12. Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: Determines whether learners can view or access the assignment after the EndDate. See About Availability Type for details. No data available for assignments created before December 2022/20.22.12. Field can be null.

AssignmentSubmissionDetails.name: AssignmentSubmissionDetails
AssignmentSubmissionDetails.description: The Assignment Submission Details Brightspace Data Set returns details of each individual submission made by the user for all your org units. Results are ordered from newest to oldest.

columns.name: SubmissionId
columns.description: Unique submission identifier

columns.name: DropboxId
columns.description: Unique assignment identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: GroupId
columns.description: Unique group identifier for the submission made to the assignment. Field can be null.

columns.name: NumberOfFilesSubmitted
columns.description: Number of files submitted. Field can be null.

columns.name: TotalFileSize
columns.description: Total file size of all submissions made, in bytes.

columns.name: SubmittedByUserId
columns.description: Submission made by user ID

columns.name: DateSubmitted
columns.description: Date the submission was made (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Comments on the submission. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsTurnItInExempt
columns.description: Is exempt from TurnItIn. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Is submission deleted

columns.name: IsPreview
columns.description: Is submission preview

AssignmentSubmissions.name: AssignmentSubmissions
AssignmentSubmissions.description: The Assignment Submissions Brightspace Data Set returns a high-level summary information of all submissions made by a user to a given assignment for all your org units. Results are ordered from newest to oldest.

columns.name: DropboxId
columns.description: Unique assignment identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: SubmitterId
columns.description: The user or group ID of the submitter.

columns.name: SubmitterType
columns.description: The type submission, either user or group. Field can be null.

columns.name: FileSubmissionCount
columns.description: Number of files submitted to the assignment

columns.name: TotalFileSize
columns.description: Total file size of all submissions, in bytes.

columns.name: FeedbackUserId
columns.description: Feedback by user ID. Field can be null.

columns.name: FeedbackIsRead
columns.description: Is feedback read

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Score the user achieved on the assignment submission. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsGraded
columns.description: Is assignment submission graded

columns.name: LastSubmissionDate
columns.description: Last submission date time (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: Feedback
columns.description: Instructor feedback. Field can be null.

columns.name: FeedbackLastModified
columns.description: Last modified date time for draft and published feedback (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: FeedbackReadDate
columns.description: First date time that feedback is read (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CompletionDate
columns.description: Indicates the date when the assignment was submitted by the learner (UTC). Field can be null.

AssignmentSummary.name: AssignmentSummary
AssignmentSummary.description: The Assignment Summary Brightspace Data Set returns information on the assignments for your org units.

columns.name: DropboxId
columns.description: Unique assignment identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Assignment name

columns.name: Category
columns.description: Assignment category. Field can be null.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Individual/group assignment

columns.name: GradeItemId
columns.description: Unique grade item identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: PossibleScore
columns.description: Possible score a user can achieve on the assignment. Field can be null.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Assignment availability start date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Assignment availability end date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: Assignment due date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: IsRestricted
columns.description: Is assignment restricted

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Is assignment deleted

columns.name: TurnItInEnabled
columns.description: Is TurnItIn enabled

columns.name: IsHidden
columns.description: True or false value indicating whether the assignment is hidden.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Display sort order used for the content objects

columns.name: SubmissionType
columns.description: Indicates the format submission type for the assignment being submitted. Values for this column include File, Text, On Paper, and Observed.

columns.name: CompletionType
columns.description: Indicates how the assignment was completed. Values for this column include OnSubmission, DueDate, ManuallyByLearner, and OnEvaluation.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique release condition result identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: CategoryId
columns.description: Unique category identifier for the assignment. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: StartDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: Determines whether learners can view or access the assignment before the StartDate. Refer to About Availability Type for details. All assignments with start dates created before December 2022/20.22.12 have default value '0'. Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: Determines whether learners can view or access the assignment after the EndDate. Refer to About Availability Type for details. All assignments with end dates created before December 2022/20.22.12 have default value '0'. Field can be null.

columns.name: AIUtilization
columns.description: Indicates whether D2L Lumi (Brightspace AI) capabilities were used and the level of AI involvement. Possible values: 0 - No AI capabilities were involved. 1 - Generated by AI and reviewed by a human. 2 - Generated by AI and edited by a human. 3 - Assisted or uplifted by AI.

AttendanceRegisters.name: AttendanceRegisters
AttendanceRegisters.description: The Attendance Registers Brightspace Data Set describes the registers for taking attendance that exist in your organization.

columns.name: AttendanceRegisterId
columns.description: Unique attendance register identifier.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: The name given to the register.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: The description of the attendance register. Field can be null.

columns.name: SchemeId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the scheme used for the register.

columns.name: IsVisible
columns.description: Indicates if users are allowed to view this register.

columns.name: IncludeAllUsers
columns.description: Indicates that all users in the course can be assessed with this register. If false, only specific groups/sections are included.

columns.name: CauseForConcern
columns.description: The threshold at which users will be flagged as a concern. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: DateDeleted
columns.description: Deleted date of the attendance register (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: DeletedBy
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user who performed the delete action. Field can be null.

AttendanceSchemes.name: AttendanceSchemes
AttendanceSchemes.description: The Attendance Schemes Brightspace Data Set describes the schemes that are available for use with attendance registers in your organization.

columns.name: SchemeId
columns.description: Unique scheme identifier.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: SchemeName
columns.description: The given name of the scheme.

columns.name: SchemeSymbolId
columns.description: Unique scheme symbol identifier.

columns.name: SymbolName
columns.description: The name given to the symbol.

columns.name: SymbolValue
columns.description: The value used for the symbol.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: The score as a percentage that contributes towards the attendance score when a symbol is given. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: DeletedBy

AttendanceUserSessions.name: AttendanceUserSessions
AttendanceUserSessions.description: The Attendance User Sessions Brightspace Data Set provides the result for each user's session in each register in your organization.

columns.name: SchemeSymbolId

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the user session has been deleted.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

AudioVideoProcessed.name: AudioVideoProcessed
AudioVideoProcessed.description: In the Audio Video Processed Brightspace Data Set, each row represents one completed media processing job. The data set captures events from January 2022 onwards.

columns.name: ContentId
columns.description: Unique content identifier.

columns.name: RevisionId
columns.description: Unique revision identifier.

columns.name: RevisionNumber
columns.description: Indicates the version of the media object that this processing job applies to. For example: for a video that's been edited 4 times, the row representing the media processing job for version 3 will have "3" in this column.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Type of content for this revision: Audio or Video.

columns.name: Source
columns.description: Location in Brightspace from which the content was added. Field can be null.

columns.name: RevisionSize
columns.description: Size of all resources for this revision in bytes.

columns.name: Duration
columns.description: Duration of the revision in seconds.

columns.name: RequiredTranscoding
columns.description: True if the revision required transcoding.

columns.name: RequiredTranscribing
columns.description: True if the revision required transcribing.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date this revision was last modified (UTC).

AuditorRelationshipsLog.name: AuditorRelationshipsLog
AuditorRelationshipsLog.description: The Auditor Relationships Log Brightspace Data Set has a record of auditors and the users they audit in the organization. The User Auditors tool must be enabled to access this data. Note: The data set may appear blank unless new auditor-learner relationships are added. All historical data is populated 30 to 60 days after the November 2021/20.21.11 release.

columns.name: AuditorId
columns.description: UserId (unique identifier) of the auditor.

columns.name: UserToAuditId
columns.description: UserId (unique identifier) of the user to be audited by the auditor.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Org Unit identifier where the auditor relationship exists.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: The action performed on the relationship. Either Created or Deleted.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: UserId who modified the auditor relationship.

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: Date and time when the auditor relationship was modified (UTC).

AwardObjects.name: AwardObjects
AwardObjects.description: The Award Objects Brightspace Data Set returns details on all awards that were created anywhere in the organization.

columns.name: AwardId
columns.description: Unique award identifier

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Award name

columns.name: AwardTypeId

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Award type (Certificate or Badge)

columns.name: Description

columns.name: ExpiryCalculationType

columns.name: ExpiryNotificationType
columns.description: Time unit for expiry notification (such as days)

columns.name: ExpiryDate
columns.description: Date when the award is scheduled to expire. Can be NULL if the award never expires or has a relative expiry date.

columns.name: ImagePath
columns.description: Indicates the location where the award image is stored. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedByUserId
columns.description: User who created the award

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date award was last changed (UTC).

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates whether the award is deleted

columns.name: Criteria
columns.description: Indicates the criteria necessary to issue the award. Field can be null.

AwardsIssued.name: AwardsIssued
AwardsIssued.description: The Awards Issued Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all the awards that have been issued for your org units. The only available data for the LastModifiedDate field is from August 2023 onwards.

columns.name: AwardId
columns.description: Unique award identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier

columns.name: IssuedBy
columns.description: Issued by user ID

columns.name: IssueDate
columns.description: Award issue date (UTC).

columns.name: ExpiryDate
columns.description: Award expiry date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: IssuedId
columns.description: Unique issued identifier

columns.name: Criteria
columns.description: Indicates the criteria necessary to issue the award.

columns.name: Evidence
columns.description: Provides proof that the user has met the criteria for the award.

columns.name: RevokedDate
columns.description: Award revocation date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: RevokedReason
columns.description: Reason for revoking issued award. Field can be null.

columns.name: RevokedBy
columns.description: User who revoked the award. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the issued award object.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date the issued award object was last modified (UTC). Only captures data from August 2023 onwards. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Version number of this issued award.

CPDJobTargets.description: The CPD Job Targets Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all targets set by the user attribute Job Title. If no user attributes are defined for your organization, the data set will be empty.

columns.name: PrincipalId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the principal which sets the job target.

columns.name: SubjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the subject associated with the job target.

columns.name: JobTitle
columns.description: The title of the job.

columns.name: StructuredMinutes
columns.description: The structured record duration of the job target. Field can be null.

columns.name: UnstructuredMinutes
columns.description: The unstructured record duration of the job target. Field can be null.

columns.name: StructuredRecordCount
columns.description: The structured record count of the job target. Field can be null.

columns.name: UnstructuredRecordCount
columns.description: The unstructured record count of the job target. Field can be null.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: The date (UTC) of rolling or specific SPS for job annual target and progress tracking has been updated. Field can be null.

columns.name: DateDeleted
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) the subject was deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) the job target was added or last updated based on the Tracking Method.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. The Version of the job target is updated based on the Tracking Method.

CompetencyActivities.name: CompetencyActivities
CompetencyActivities.description: The Competency Activities Brightspace Data Set retrieves the data required to associate rubrics with competency activities. Using the returned data, clients can validate that they have configured the associations correctly.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the activity associated with the competency. Can join with Competency Activity Results, Activity Exemptions Log, SCORM Objectives, SCORM Activity Attempts, SCORM Interactions, and SCORM Interaction Attempts.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Identifier for the Org Unit associated with the competency.

columns.name: ActivityName
columns.description: The name of the activity.

columns.name: ActivityTypeId
columns.description: Identifier for the activity type

columns.name: AssessmentType
columns.description: Rubric assessment type

columns.name: ObjectLookupId
columns.description: Lookup object id that is associated with the object.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Identifier of the rubric. This field is only valid for competency activities associated with a rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: LevelId
columns.description: Identifier of the rubric level associated with the competency activity. This field is only valid for competency activities associated with a rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: RubricCriterionId
columns.description: Identifier of the rubric criterion associated with the activity. This field is only valid for competency activities associated with a rubric and scored at the criteria level. If the overall rubric score is used, the value is null.

columns.name: AssessmentThresholdCriteria
columns.description: For numeric activity only. Can be >= (greater than or equal to), > (greater than), = (equal to), <= (less than or equal to), or < (less than). Field can be null.

columns.name: AssessmentThreshold
columns.description: When a competency activity is evaluated, the assessment threshold is the value that must be met by a learner to achieve the competency. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsAutoEval
columns.description: Indicates if this competency is automatically evaluated. If this is false, the competency is a manual evaluation.

columns.name: RubricName
columns.description: Name of the rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: RubricLevelRequired
columns.description: Level required to achieve this learning objective. Field can be null.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Identifier of the competency object associated with the competency activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: ActivityType
columns.description: Type of activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

CourseAccess.name: CourseAccess
CourseAccess.description: The Course Access Brightspace Data Set returns information on each day each user has accessed each course offering from the LMS (via a browser) across the organization. The data set does not include course access via any of our Apps. The data set contains data from 1 January 2021 onwards and adheres to the default system limit of 150 million rows of the most recent data. Note: If an administrator changes your time zone at the organization level, this can affect the calculation of DayAccessed because this field is in local time.

columns.description: Unique org unit identifier.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: DayAccessed

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Indicates the time in UTC that a user accessed the course.

columns.name: Source
columns.description: The source of the course access. Only Pulse data is available at this time.

columns.description: User who deleted the discussion topic. Field can be null.

columns.description: Unique grade identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreOutOf
columns.description: Topic score used to evaluate the discussion thread. Field can be null. Note: Score can exceed ScoreOutOf.

columns.name: ScoreCalculationMethod
columns.description: Method used to calculate score. Strings are predefined, with the following values:Average - Calculates the score from the average score of each post in the topic made by a user. Max - Calculates the score based on the maximum score of any one post in the topic for a user.Min - Calculates the score based on the minimum score of any one post in the topic for a user.Mode Max - Given the number of posts, selects the score that is repeated the most. If there is a tie, it takes the highest score.Mode Min - Given the number of posts, selects the score that is repeated the most. If there is a tie, it takes the lowest score.Sum - Calculates the score from the sum of scores on each post in a topic for a user.Blank value (null) - The score is not calculated based on the scores of each post (Manual updates).

columns.name: IncludeNonScoredValues
columns.description: Indicates whether to include non-scored values. True posts that have not been scored are scored as 0. Otherwise, posts without a score are not included in the score aggregate (defined in the ScoreCalculationType).

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: StartDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: Before the StartDate, this type determines whether learners can view or access the discussion topic. Refer to About Availability type for details. Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Last date when learners can post to the topic (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: After the EndDate, this type determines whether learners can view or access the discussion topic. Refer to About Availability type for details. Field can be null.

columns.name: AIUtilization
columns.description: Indicates whether D2L Lumi (Brightspace AI) capabilities were used and the level of AI involvement. Possible values: 0 - No AI capabilities were involved. 1 - Generated by AI and reviewed by a human. 2 - Generated by AI and edited by a human. 3 - Assisted or uplifted by AI.
