columns.name: IMSRoleNames
columns.description: A list of user's IMS roles.

columns.name: ImpersonatingUserId
columns.description: The impersonating user who performed this launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: ImpersonatingUserIMSRoleName
columns.description: A list of impersonating user's IMS roles. Field can be null.

columns.name: LaunchDate
columns.description: The UTC time when this launch occurred.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Id of the org unit where this launch happened.

columns.name: LTILinkId
columns.description: The id of the link that was used for the LTI launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeploymentId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the link's deployment that was used for the LTI launch. This is only available for LTI 1.3 links. Field can be null.

columns.name: ClientId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the link's registration that was used for the LTI launch. This is only available for LTI 1.3 links. Field can be null.

columns.name: ToolProviderId
columns.description: The id of the link's tool provider that was used for the LTI launch. This is only available for LTI 1.1 links. Field can be null.

columns.name: ContentTopicId
columns.description: Id of the content topic where this launch happened. Field can be null.

columns.name: ParentModuleId
columns.description: Id of the parent module where this launch happened. Field can be null.

columns.name: Placement
columns.description: Placement type of this launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: MessageVersion
columns.description: LTI message version of this launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: RequestType
columns.description: LTI request type of this launch. Field can be null.

LTILinkMigrationAudit.name: LTILinkMigrationAudit
LTILinkMigrationAudit.description: The LTI Link Migration Audit Brightspace Data Set logs all attempted LTI link migrations. Each row in the data set represents an attempted link migration from LTI 1.1 to LTI 1.3.

columns.name: LTIMigrationId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each individual link migration

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: ID of the person who triggered the migration

columns.name: MigrationDate
columns.description: The date the migration occurred for this link (UTC)

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: ID of the org unit where the launch migration occurred

columns.name: LinkId
columns.description: ID of the link that was migrated

columns.name: LinkURL
columns.description: Launch URL for the link

columns.name: LinkName
columns.description: Name of the link

columns.name: ClientId
columns.description: ID of the registration this link was migrated to. Field can be null.

columns.name: RegistrationDomain
columns.description: Domain of the registration this link was migrated to. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeploymentId
columns.description: ID of the link's deployment that was used for the LTI migration. Field can be null.

columns.name: JobId
columns.description: ID for the job this link was migrated under.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Status result for this link migration. Possible values: 0 = Success 1 = Error 2 = Not Found

columns.name: FailureCode
columns.description: Error code for failed migrations. Possible values: 0 = Registration Not Found 1 = Deployment Not Enabled 2 = Deployment Not Found 3 = Link Not Found 4 = Link Not Legacy 5 = Link URL Invalid 6 = Unknown 7 = Auto Migrate is not enabled in the deployment Field can be null.

columns.name: MigrationType
columns.description: How migration was triggered. Possible values: 0 = Link API 1 = Copy Course 2 = Course Migration Button 3 = Course Migration API

columns.name: LegacyURL
columns.description: The legacy domain the link was migrated from. Only populates if the legacy domain is different than the registration domain. Field can be null.

LTILinks.name: LTILinks
LTILinks.description: The LTI Links Brightspace Data Set retrieves the list of LTI links that exist in the organization. It does not include deleted links.

columns.name: LtiLinkId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the LTI link.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Identifier for the Org Unit where the link was created.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: The title of the link.

columns.name: LinkType
columns.description: The type of link, either being a basic LTI launch or a CIM/Deep Linking launch to retrieve content from a tool. (0 = Basic LTI Launch, 1 = Content Item Message or Deeplinking).

columns.name: LTIVersion
columns.description: Indicates whether the link is LTI 1.1 or LTI 1.3.

columns.name: Url
columns.description: The URL used during the launch. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the LTI link. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsVisible
columns.description: Determines if the link is displayed when adding to course content in the course. For LTI 1.1, this is called IsVisible in the UI.

columns.name: SendTCInfo
columns.description: If true, determines if the tool_consumer variables are allowed to be included in the LTI launch. LTI 1.1 only.

columns.name: SendContextInfo
columns.description: If true, determines if context_id, context_title, context_label, and context_type variables are included in the LTI launch. LTI 1.1 only.

columns.name: SendCourseInfo
columns.description: If true, determines if LISSourcedId is included in the launch. LTI 1.1 only.

columns.name: SendOrgUnitInfo
columns.description: If true, determines if Org Unit Id, Course Name, Course Code, Org Unit Type, LIS Course Offering Sourcedid, and LIS Course Section Sourcedid are included in the LTI launch. LTI 1.3 only. Field can be null.

columns.name: SendUserId
columns.description: If true, determines a unique identifier for the user, generated on the user's first launch. LTI 1.1 only. This is always sent to LTI 1.3 and cannot be turned off unless Anonymous launch is used.

columns.name: SendUserName
columns.description: If true, determines if users first, last, and given name (first last) are sent during launch.

columns.name: SendUserEmail
columns.description: If true, determines if the user's primary email is sent during launch.

columns.name: SendLinkTitle
columns.description: If true, determines if the LTI Link Title is sent during launch. LTI 1.1 only.

columns.name: SendLinkDescription
columns.description: If true, determines if the LTI Link Description is sent during launch. LTI 1.1 only.

columns.name: SendD2LUserName
columns.description: If true, determines if the Brightspace username is sent during launch.

columns.name: SendD2LOrgDefinedId
columns.description: If true, determines if the Brightspace OrgDefinedId is sent during launch.

columns.name: SendD2LOrgRoleId
columns.description: If true, determines if the custom Brightspace D2L role is sent during launch. LTI 1.1 only.

columns.name: SendBrightspaceUserId
columns.description: If true, determines if the D2L User Id is sent during the launch. LTI 1.3 only. Field can be null.

columns.name: Anonymous
columns.description: If true, no user information is sent during the launch. LTI 1.3 only. Field can be null.

columns.name: Shared
columns.description: Indicates whether the link is shared with additional org units or not. Field can be null.

columns.name: UseToolProviderSecuritySettings
columns.description: If true, uses the Tool Provider security settings versus link security settings based on domain matching. LTI 1.1 only.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: The last time a link was updated. Field can be null.

columns.name: OuAvailabilitySetId
columns.description: Unique sharing identifier. Can be used to join on LTI Links Shared. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User ID of user who last modified the LTI link.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the LTI link is deleted.

LocalAuthenticationSecurityLog.name: LocalAuthenticationSecurityLog
LocalAuthenticationSecurityLog.description: The Local Authentication Security Log Brightspace Data Set has a record of users who are authorized for local login and whether two-factor authentication was enabled or disabled. This data set only captures data from May 2022 onwards.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: The action performed for the user. Possible values:

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: UserId of the user who performed the action.

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: Date and time when the action was performed (UTC).

MediaConsumptionLog.name: MediaConsumptionLog
MediaConsumptionLog.description: In the Media Consumption Log Brightspace Data Set, each row represents one session where a user interacted with a media object, beginning when the user starts playback and ending when the user stops engaging with the media object. The data set captures events from November 2023 onwards.

columns.name: LogId
columns.description: Unique identifier for this consumption session.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user who consumed the content.

columns.name: ContentId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the content that was consumed.

columns.name: RevisionId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the revision of the content that was consumed.

columns.name: ContentType
columns.description: Type of content for this revision: Audio or Video.

columns.name: ClientApp
columns.description: Location in Brightspace from which the content was added. Field can be null.

columns.name: DateConsumed
columns.description: Date and time when the user started this consumption session (UTC).

columns.name: DurationPercentageWatched
columns.description: Percentage (from 0 to 100) of the content's duration that the user consumed in this session.

MediaObjects.name: MediaObjects
MediaObjects.description: In the Media Objects Brightspace Data Set, each row represents one audio or video content object uploaded to Media Library. The data set captures media objects from January 2022 onwards.

columns.name: ContentId
columns.description: Unique content identifier.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: Title of the media object.

columns.name: RevisionCount
columns.description: Number of revisions of this media object.

columns.name: OwnerId
columns.description: Brightspace user identifier for the owner of the media object.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date the media object was last modified (UTC).

OrganizationalUnitAncestors.name: OrganizationalUnitAncestors
OrganizationalUnitAncestors.description: The Organizational Unit Ancestors Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all the org units and the corresponding ancestors for an org unit. An ancestor is defined as a parent of an org unit.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: AncestorOrgUnitId
columns.description: Parent org unit identifier

OrganizationalUnitDescendants.name: OrganizationalUnitDescendants
OrganizationalUnitDescendants.description: The Organizational Unit Descendants Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all the org units and the corresponding descendants for an org unit. A descendant is defined as the child of an org unit.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: DescendantOrgUnitId
columns.description: Child org unit identifier

OrganizationalUnitParents.name: OrganizationalUnitParents
OrganizationalUnitParents.description: The Organizational Unit Parents Brightspace Data Set returns the direct parent of each org unit in order to build out the initial org unit structure.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: ParentOrgUnitId
columns.description: Parent org unit identifier

columns.name: RowVersion
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: DateDeleted
columns.description: Date the parent-child relationship was deleted (UTC). Field can be null.

OrganizationalUnitRecentAccess.name: OrganizationalUnitRecentAccess
OrganizationalUnitRecentAccess.description: The Organizational Unit Recent Access Brightspace Data Set returns a list of users, corresponding org units, and the time stamp when they most recently accessed the org unit.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: User Id of the user that accessed the org unit

columns.name: LastAccessedDate
columns.description: Date the org was last accessed (UTC).

OrganizationalUnits.name: OrganizationalUnits
OrganizationalUnits.description: The Organizational Units Brightspace Data Set returns details about all org units within your organization.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: Organization
columns.description: Organization name

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Org unit type. For example: Group, Section, Semester, Department, etc.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Org unit name. Field can be null.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Org unit code. Field can be null.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Availability start date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Availability end date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Is the org unit active

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Org unit create date

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Is the org unit soft deleted or recycled. Soft delete - the org unit has been soft deleted from the application, but is still present in the database. Recycled - the org unit remains in the recycle bin until removed, at which point it is deleted. The OrgName for recycled or soft deleted org units is SYSTEM. Backfill of historical IsDeleted, DeletedDate, and RecycledDate values is determined by the date/time values in the OrgUnit audit log. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeletedDate
columns.description: Date the org unit was soft deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: RecycledDate
columns.description: Date the org unit was recycled. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the content in the row.

columns.name: OrgUnitTypeId
columns.description: Identifier for the org unit type.

OutcomeDetails.name: OutcomeDetails
OutcomeDetails.description: The Outcome Details Brightspace Data Set provides details of the outcomes that are part of all registries in all your org units. User IDs and dates are only populated for authored outcomes because updates to ASN outcomes rely on the cache invalidation system (performed by a system user). The only available data for authored outcomes is from June 2021 onwards. All data for ASN imported outcomes is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: Unique outcome identifier.

columns.name: OutcomeDefinitionSource
columns.description: Provider for this outcome, e.g. ASN.

columns.name: OutcomeDefinitionId
columns.description: ID of outcome within provider (for example ASN or locally authored). Field can be an empty string.

columns.name: ParentOutcomeId
columns.description: ID of the parent outcome, if nested under a parent outcome object in the same org unit, or null for top level outcomes with no parent. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Main body of this outcome. Truncated to 1000 characters.

columns.name: Notation
columns.description: Outcome notation for ASN outcomes.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: For authored outcomes, date when this item was initially created (UTC). For imported outcomes, this field is null. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: For authored outcomes, ID of user who initially created this item. For imported outcomes, this field is null. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted for authored outcomes. This flag will be null for outcomes imported from external providers, e.g. ASN. Field can be null.

OutcomesAlignedtoToolObjects.name: OutcomesAlignedtoToolObjects
OutcomesAlignedtoToolObjects.description: The Outcomes Aligned to Tool Objects Brightspace Data Set provides details of which outcomes are aligned to which assessment tools for all your org units. It includes a row for every outcome aligned to an assessment activity, for both direct alignments and alignments references via rubrics. The data set only captures data from June 2021 onwards.

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: Type of tool this outcome is aligned to. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: ID of the tool this outcome is aligned to. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: ID of this Outcome in the Outcome Details data set.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry representing the context in which this alignment exists.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

OutcomesAssessedCheckpoints.name: OutcomesAssessedCheckpoints
OutcomesAssessedCheckpoints.description: The Outcomes Assessed Checkpoints Brightspace Data Set provides details about the Overall Achievement Calculation Settings for a checkpoint. The data set only captures data from July 2021 onwards.

columns.name: CheckpointId
columns.description: ID of this checkpoint.

columns.name: DemonstrationId
columns.description: ID of demonstration which assesses this outcome against the checkpoint.

columns.name: Feedback
columns.description: Feedback left by assessor, truncated to 1000 characters.

columns.name: ConfigDecayRate
columns.description: Value of the decay rate in Mastery View Settings for checkpoint calculation.

columns.name: ConfigAggregationMethod
columns.description: Calculation method selected in Mastery View Settings. Possible values:

columns.name: ConfigIncludedActivities
columns.description: Selected activities for use in calculation in Mastery View Settings. If Most Recently Assessed Activities is selected, the specific number of activities to include is stored in ConfigRecentlyAssessedActivityCount. Possible values:

columns.name: ConfigMultipleAttemptStrategy
columns.description: Selected attempt for use in calculation in Mastery View Settings. Possible values:

columns.name: ConfigRecentlyAssessedActivityCount
columns.description: The number of recently assessed activities to include in calculation, when Most Recently Assessed Activities is selected.

columns.name: ConfigTieBreaker
columns.description: Selected method for how to handle multiple items of the same count in calculating the overall level of achievement in Mastery View Settings. Possible values:

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified. Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

columns.name: HasMetAchievementThreshold
columns.description: Indicates whether a learner has met the achievement threshold. Field can be null.

OutcomesCourseSpecificScales.name: OutcomesCourseSpecificScales
OutcomesCourseSpecificScales.description: The Outcomes Course Specific Scales Brightspace Data Set provides details on which achievement scales and achievement thresholds are being used in each of your courses. The only available data for course specific achievement scales is from May 2023 onwards.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: ID of the org unit this registry is associated with.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of the current registry.

columns.name: ScaleId
columns.description: ID of the scale set as the LOA for the current registry.

columns.name: AchievementThreshold
columns.description: Level ID representing the threshold of achievement for this registry. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was originally created (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified. Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Whether this item has been deleted.

OutcomesDemonstrations.name: OutcomesDemonstrations
OutcomesDemonstrations.description: In the Outcomes Demonstrations Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents an evaluation of an assessment activity that is aligned to a learning outcome. For most tool object types, assessments are only visible in this data set when they are made visible to learners. The data set only captures data from June 2021 onwards.

columns.name: DemonstrationId
columns.description: ID of this demonstration.

columns.name: ExplicitlyEnteredScaleLevelId
columns.description: Result of this evaluation if manually entered by assessor. Field can be null if achieved level has not been manually overridden.

columns.name: AutomaticallyGeneratedScaleLevelId
columns.description: Result of this evaluation if automatically generated by LMS. Field can be null.

columns.name: AlignedObjectType
columns.description: Type of assessed tool for this demonstration. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: AlignedObjectId
columns.description: ID of assessed tool for this demonstration. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: ID of assessed outcome.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry representing the context in which the demonstration was made.

columns.name: IsPublished
columns.description: Indicates if this demonstration has been made available to the assessed learner. Field can be null.

columns.name: AssessedUserId
columns.description: ID of the user who made the submission.

columns.name: AssessedDate
columns.description: Date of initial assessment (UTC).

columns.name: AssessorUserId
columns.description: ID of the user who initially evaluated the submission. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

OutcomesProgramDetails.name: OutcomesProgramDetails
OutcomesProgramDetails.description: The Outcomes Program Details Brightspace Data Set provides details about the programs that are defined to hold a collection of outcomes (registry). All data for the data set is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: ProgramId
columns.description: ID of this program which owns the registry.

columns.name: ProgramName
columns.description: The name of this program.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: ID of the org unit which owns this program.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

OutcomesRegistryOwners.name: OutcomesRegistryOwners
OutcomesRegistryOwners.description: In the Outcomes Registry Owners Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents a registry for both program and org unit owned registries. The data set only captures data from June 2021 onwards.

columns.name: OwnerType
columns.description: Type of entity which owns this registry. Set to 1 if owner is org unit, set to 2 if owner is program.

columns.name: OwnerId
columns.description: ID or org unit owner when OwnerType is 1. ID of program when OwnerType is 2.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry for the org unit or program.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

OutcomesRubricAlignments.name: OutcomesRubricAlignments
OutcomesRubricAlignments.description: In the Outcomes Rubric Alignments Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents an alignment for a learning outcome to a rubric criterion row. The data set only captures data from June 2021 onwards.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric identifier.

columns.name: CriterionId
columns.description: Identifier for the criterion row of the rubric.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the outcome object.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of the registry for the org unit or program.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: The date when the alignment of this outcome was recorded for this rubric criterion row. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of the user who initially created this alignment. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Set to true if the outcome alignment has been removed from the rubric or the rubric has been deleted.

OutcomesScaleDefinition.name: OutcomesScaleDefinition
OutcomesScaleDefinition.description: In the Outcomes Scale Definition Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents an achievement scale defined at the organization level. All data for the data set is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: ScaleId
columns.description: ID for this scale.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of this scale.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Indicates if this is the scale used by default whenever an assessment of an outcome takes place.

columns.name: UsePercentages
columns.description: Indicates if percentage ranges are specified for each scale level. This is used when suggesting a scale level for an assessment. Specific percentage threshold values are associated with each Scale Level.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry that owns this scale.

OutcomesScaleLevelDefinition.name: OutcomesScaleLevelDefinition
OutcomesScaleLevelDefinition.description: In the Outcomes Scale Level Definition Brightspace Data Set, each entry represents a scale level defined in your scales. On the evaluation UI, they are represented by a single, clickable "frame". Examples include "Not Yet Achieved", "Achieved", and "Mastered". Scale levels can't be deleted once created. Scale levels become inaccessible when their parent scale is deleted. All data for the data set is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: ScaleLevelId
columns.description: ID for this scale level.

columns.name: ScaleId
columns.description: ID of the parent scale.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of this scale level.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Determines ordering for this scale level.

columns.name: PercentageRangeStart
columns.description: The score percentage threshold boundary for this scale level. This value is used when automatically suggesting a scale level from numeric assessment results. Field can be null.

columns.name: RGB
columns.description: Color of this scale level in HTML hex notation.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

OutcomesinRegistries.name: OutcomesinRegistries
OutcomesinRegistries.description: The Outcomes in Registries Brightspace Data Set provides details of which outcomes belong to which registries for all your org units. It can be used to list all outcomes in the intent list of a course, or all the outcomes in a program. The only available data for org unit owned registries is from June 2021 onwards. All data for program registries is available, starting with your organization's first use of Learning Outcomes.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: ID of this Outcome in the Outcome Details data set.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry representing the context in which this outcome exists.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: For imported outcomes, the date that this outcome was mapped to the registry (UTC). For authored outcomes, the date this outcome was created. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who imported or created the outcome in the registry. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.

PortfolioCategories.name: PortfolioCategories
PortfolioCategories.description: The Portfolio Categories Brightspace Data Set details the categories that have been created in your organization.

columns.name: CategoryId
columns.description: Unique category identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Portfolio category name.

columns.name: IsRetired
columns.description: Indicates the category is retired and therefore cannot be used.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the portfolio category is deleted

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the portfolio category was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the portfolio category.

PortfolioEvidenceCategories.name: PortfolioEvidenceCategories
PortfolioEvidenceCategories.description: The Portfolio Evidence Categories Brightspace Data Set details the one or many categories that are mapped to each piece of evidence in the Portfolios in your organization.

columns.name: CategoryId
columns.description: The identifier for the category

columns.name: EvidenceId
columns.description: The identifier for the evidence

columns.name: Group
columns.description: Indicates how the category was linked to the evidence. By the learner or instructor.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates whether the link between the category and the evidence is deleted

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the portfolio category was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the portfolio category

PortfolioEvidenceLog.name: PortfolioEvidenceLog
PortfolioEvidenceLog.description: The Portfolio Evidence Log Brightspace Data Set returns the actions that occur to each piece of evidence in the Portfolios in your organization. The first data point is from May, 2019 or your first use of the Portfolio tool, whichever is more recent.

columns.name: LogId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each action that occurs on each object in a portfolio.

columns.name: ParentObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the evidence. Field can be null.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the object where the action occurred. This is equal to ParentObjectId when the ObjectType is evidence.

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: Indicates what type of object the action occurred on such as the evidence itself or reflection, etc.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: The action that occurred: Created, Updated or Deleted.

columns.name: IsMobile
columns.description: Indicates if the action occurred on a mobile device.

columns.name: ActionDate
columns.description: Date action was completed (UTC).

PortfolioEvidenceObjects.name: PortfolioEvidenceObjects
PortfolioEvidenceObjects.description: The Portfolio Evidence Objects Brightspace Data Set defines the attributes of each piece of evidence in Portfolios in your organization.

columns.name: EvidenceId
columns.description: Unique evidence identifier

columns.name: OwnerId
columns.description: The user ID that this evidence belongs to

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: EvidenceType
columns.description: The type of evidence

columns.name: Title
columns.description: The evidence title

columns.name: IsApproved
columns.description: Indicates the evidence is approved

columns.name: IsSpotlighted
columns.description: Indicates the evidence is spotlighted

columns.name: IsSharedToParents
columns.description: Indicates the evidence is shared to parents

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates that the evidence object is deleted.

columns.name: IsRecoverableByInstructor
columns.description: Indicates that the deleted evidence object can be recovered by the instructor. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the evidence object was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the evidence object

columns.name: IsSharedWithInstructor
columns.description: Indicates the evidence is shared to instructors. Field can be null.

columns.name: DateSharedWithInstructor
columns.description: Date when the evidence was most recently shared to instructors (UTC). Field can be null.

PreRequisiteConditionsMet.name: PreRequisiteConditionsMet
PreRequisiteConditionsMet.description: The PreRequisite Conditions Met Brightspace Data Set returns all the prerequisite conditions that have been met for applicable users in the organization. The PreRequisite Conditions Met Brightspace Data Set contains data from 1 January 2021 onwards and adheres to the default system limit of 150 million rows of the most recent data.

columns.name: PreRequisiteId
columns.description: Unique prerequisite identifier.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: DateMet
columns.description: Date the prerequisite condition was met (UTC). Field can be null

columns.name: Action
columns.description: The action that occurred: Met or Deleted.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: The date and time when the condition was Met or Deleted. For Met conditions, this matches the DateMet column.

QuestionLibrary.name: QuestionLibrary
QuestionLibrary.description: The Question Library Brightspace Data Set details all the questions that have been created in the organization. This includes quiz questions that are not currently used in a quiz.

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier. Each time you edit a quiz, survey, or self-assessment question, a new version of that question is created, indicated by the QuestionVersionID field.

columns.name: IsAutoGraded
columns.description: Indicates if the question is automatically graded.

columns.name: TemplateTypeId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the template used to create this question. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuestionType
columns.description: Type of question. Field can be null.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Question name. Field can be null.

columns.name: Question
columns.description: Body of the question. Field can be null.

columns.name: Comment
columns.description: Comment associated with the question. Field can be null. When you add a question to a quiz, the Overall Question Feedback field provides feedback comments during the grading process. The information captured in this field is the Comment field.

columns.name: AnswerKey
columns.description: Answer key for the question. This only applies to Written Response Questions. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: Date the question was created (UTC)

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: AllowsAttachments
columns.description: Indicates if attachments are allowed in this question. Field can be null.

columns.name: AIUtilization
columns.description: Indicates whether D2L Lumi (Brightspace AI) capabilities were used and the level of AI involvement. Possible values: 0 - No AI capabilities were involved. 1 - Generated by AI and reviewed by a human. 2 - Generated by AI and edited by a human. 3 - Assisted or uplifted by AI.

QuestionRelationships.name: QuestionRelationships
QuestionRelationships.description: The Question Relationships Brightspace Data Set details which quizzes, sections, question pools, surveys, or self-assessments the questions in Question Library have been added to.

columns.name: CollectionId
columns.description: Unique question collection identifier

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier. Each time you edit a quiz, survey, or self-assessment question, a new version of that question is created, indicated by the QuestionVersionID field. Field can be null.

columns.name: Order
columns.description: Order in which questions appear in the user interface. If the question is within a section, the Order field uses the section's order in the user interface.

columns.name: SectionId
columns.description: Unique section identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsQuestionPool
columns.description: Indicates if the question pool is a random section.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: Date the question was created (UTC)

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who created the quiz, section, question pool, survey, or self-assessment. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the quiz, section, question pool, survey, or self-assessment was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who last modified the quiz, section, question pool, survey, or self-assessment. Field can be null.

columns.name: Points
columns.description: Possible points for the question. Field can be null.

columns.name: Difficulty
columns.description: Difficulty level assigned to the question. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsBonus
columns.description: Indicates if the question is a bonus question. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsMandatory
columns.description: Indicates if the question is mandatory. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the question is deleted.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the question. This column supports the Question Pools information in the Assessment Quality Dashboard. Field can be null.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the question.

QuizAttempts.name: QuizAttempts
QuizAttempts.description: The Quiz Attempts Brightspace Data Set returns details for each user quiz attempt for all your org units. This data set includes completed quiz attempts and in-progress quiz attempts.

columns.name: AttemptId
columns.description: Unique attempt identifier

columns.name: QuizId
columns.description: Unique quiz identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Attempt number for the quiz

columns.name: TimeStarted
columns.description: Quiz attempt start time (UTC).

columns.name: TimeCompleted
columns.description: Quiz attempt completion time (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Score for the attempt. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsGraded
columns.description: If a quiz has been graded

columns.name: OldAttemptNumber
columns.description: Number of previous times a learner has attempted the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates that the quiz attempt is deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: PossibleScore
columns.description: Indicates the total possible value of the quiz attempt. This should indicate what the quiz "out of" score is, even if the quiz total possible value changes after the attempt is made. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsRetakeIncorrectOnly
columns.description: Indicates if this attempt only includes questions that were incorrect on a previous attempt.

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: Quiz attempt due date (UTC). Based on when the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the quiz due date later. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeLimit
columns.description: Amount of time, in minutes, that a learner has to complete the quiz attempt. Based on when the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the quiz time limit later. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeLimitEnforced
columns.description: Indicates whether the time limit on this quiz attempt is enforced. Based on when the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the time limit enforced setting later. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeLimitExceededBehaviour
columns.description: If the time limit is enforced for this attempt, indicates the desired behavior when the time limit is exceeded. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsSynchronous
columns.description: Indicates that a quiz attempt is synchronous. A synchronous quiz's timer starts on the start date.

columns.name: DeductionPercentage
columns.description: The percentage of a question's point value that is deducted from the quiz attempt score if the question is answered incorrectly. This value remains constant once the learner begins the attempt, even if the instructor changes the deduction percentage later. Field can be null.

QuizAttemptsLog.name: QuizAttemptsLog
QuizAttemptsLog.description: The Quiz Attempts Log Brightspace Data Set returns details on the events that occur during a quiz attempt. This data set includes completed quiz attempts and in-progress quiz attempts. There is no explicit time cap placed on this data set. However, data is sorted from newest to oldest and older data will be dropped if the data set reaches the row limit.

columns.name: LogId
columns.description: Unique log identifier

columns.name: AttemptId
columns.description: Unique attempt identifier

columns.name: EventTypeId
columns.description: Unique event type identifier

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the event. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the event. Field can be null.

columns.name: EventTime
columns.description: Event occurred time (UTC).

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IPAddress at which the event occurred. Field can be null.

QuizObjects.name: QuizObjects
QuizObjects.description: The Quiz Objects Brightspace Data Set returns information about the settings and properties of a quiz.

columns.name: QuizId
columns.description: Unique quiz identifier

columns.name: QuizName
columns.description: Quiz name

columns.name: QuizDescription
columns.description: Description of the Quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuizCategory
columns.description: Category assigned to the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates if the quiz is active

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Org unit identifier associated with the quiz object

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: First time the quiz is visible. Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Last date the quiz is visible. Field can be null.

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: Date the quiz is due (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: Date the quiz was created (UTC).

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who created the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the quiz was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who last modified the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: GradeObjectId
columns.description: Grade object identifier associated with the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: OverallScoreCalculation
columns.description: Quiz score calculation method. Types include: Highest Attempt, Lowest Attempt, Average of all attempts, First Attempt, and Last Attempt. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuizScoreDenominator
columns.description: Denominator for the quiz score

columns.name: HasPassword
columns.description: Is a password required to access this quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: IPRestricted
columns.description: Is this quiz available to only certain IP Addresses. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeLimit
columns.description: Does this quiz have a time limit.

columns.name: TimeLimitEnforced
columns.description: Is the time limit assigned to this quiz enforced.

columns.name: AttemptsAllowed
columns.description: Number of times learners are permitted to attempt the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: PreventMovingBackwards
columns.description: Indicates if learners are permitted to move to previous pages in the quiz.

columns.name: AllowHints
columns.description: Indicates that there are hints allowed for the quiz.

columns.name: NotificationEmail
columns.description: Indicates that there is a notification email for this quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: DisablePagerAccess
columns.description: Indicates that learners cannot access the pager functionality

columns.name: DisplayInCalendar
columns.description: The quiz is not turned on in the calendar. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsAttemptRldb
columns.description: Indicates that a quiz was attempted using Respondus.

columns.name: IsSubviewRldb
columns.description: Indicates that a portion of the quiz was attempted using Respondus

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Display sort order used for the content objects

columns.name: CategoryId
columns.description: Unique category identifier for the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique release condition result identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsRetakeIncorrectOnly
columns.description: Indicates if the quiz allows Retake Incorrect Only.

columns.name: PagingTypeId
columns.description: Exposes page break information from the New Quiz Experience. Possible values: Field can be null.

columns.name: IsSynchronous
columns.description: Indicates that a quiz is synchronous. A synchronous quiz's timer starts on the start date.

columns.name: DeductionPercentage
columns.description: The percentage of a question's point value that will be deducted from the quiz attempt score if the question is answered incorrectly. Field can be null.

QuizQuestionAnswerOptions.name: QuizQuestionAnswerOptions
QuizQuestionAnswerOptions.description: The Quiz Question Answer Options Brightspace Data Set returns possible options for a given quiz answer. Only includes answer options for these question types: Short Answer, Fill in the Blanks, and Multi-Short Answer. Rows in the data set are filtered out if they are associated with deleted quiz attempts.

columns.name: AnswerId
columns.description: Unique answer Identifier

columns.name: AnswerText
columns.description: User answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: Weight
columns.description: Weight associated with the answer

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier

columns.name: QuizObjectId
columns.description: Unique quiz object identifier

columns.name: AnswerOptionId
columns.description: Unique answer option identifier

QuizQuestionAnswers.name: QuizQuestionAnswers
QuizQuestionAnswers.description: The Quiz Question Answers Brightspace Data Set returns possible answers for a given quiz question. This includes questions in sections or question pools.

columns.name: AnswerId
columns.description: Unique answer identifier

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Order in which the quiz answers are displayed or correct answer order for ordering questions.

columns.name: IsCorrect
columns.description: Is answer correct. Field can be null.

columns.name: Weight
columns.description: Weight associated with answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: Answer
columns.description: Answer text. Field can be null.

columns.name: Comment
columns.description: Instructor comment on the answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: System description for the type of answer expected.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the answer

QuizSurveySections.name: QuizSurveySections
QuizSurveySections.description: The Quiz Survey Sections Brightspace Data Set returns information about all the sections and question pools that have been created in quizzes in the organization.

columns.name: CollectionId
columns.description: Unique question collection identifier.

columns.name: SectionId
columns.description: Unique section identifier.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the section (title). Field can be null.

columns.name: NameIsDisplayed
columns.description: Indicates if the section name (title) is hidden or shown. Values are 0 for hidden, and 1 for shown.

columns.name: IsQuestionPool
columns.description: Indicates if the section is a question pool.

columns.name: SectionText
columns.description: Section text. Field can be null.

columns.name: SectionTextIsHTML
columns.description: Indicates if the section text is HTML or plain text.

columns.name: IsSectionTextHidden
columns.description: Indicates if the section text is hidden or shown. Values are 0 for hidden, and 1 for shown.

columns.name: QuestionPoints
columns.description: Number of points the section is worth when the section is a question pool. Sections that are not question pools will show as null. Field can be null.

columns.name: NumQuestions
columns.description: Indicates the number of questions in the section if the section is a question pool. If the section is not a question pool, 0 is displayed.

columns.name: NumChoices
columns.description: Indicates the number of choices in the question pool (pool size).

columns.name: Shuffle
columns.description: Indicates that the questions in the section are shuffled. Not to be confused with a question pool; a shuffled section displays the questions shuffled randomly.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: Date the section was created (UTC).

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who created the section. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the section was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who last modified the section. If questions are imported into the section, this will be null. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates that the section is deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets. Field can be null.

QuizUserAnswerResponses.name: QuizUserAnswerResponses
QuizUserAnswerResponses.description: The Quiz User Answer Responses Brightspace Data Set returns details on how a user answered a specific quiz question. Data includes whether an answer is correct and details around the quiz score. Rows in the data set are filtered out if they are associated with deleted quiz questions. The Quiz User Answer Responses data set and differential is limited to 3 years of data (all of the previous two calendar years and the current calendar year to date).

columns.name: AttemptId
columns.description: Unique attempt identifier

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Attempt number associated with the AttemptId

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier

columns.name: AnswerId
columns.description: Unique answer identifier

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Order in which quiz question options appear to the user. For example, the order in which multi-select or true /false options appear. Some question types can be randomized, for example, multi-select.

columns.name: IsCorrect
columns.description: Is user response correct. Field can be null.

columns.name: UserSelection
columns.description: Option the user chose for the question. Field can be null.

columns.name: UserAnswer
columns.description: User answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: FileSetId
columns.description: Indicates the auto generated file set ID of uploaded file(s). Field can be null.

QuizUserAnswers.name: QuizUserAnswers
QuizUserAnswers.description: The Quiz User Answers Brightspace Data Set returns data to describe the option a user chose or the answer a user provided for a question. Rows in the data set are filtered out if they are associated with deleted quiz questions. The Quiz User Answers Brightspace Data Set contains data from 1 January 2021 onwards and adheres to the default system limit of 150 million rows of the most recent data.

columns.name: AttemptId
columns.description: Unique attempt identifier

columns.name: QuestionId
columns.description: Unique question identifier.

columns.name: QuestionVersionId
columns.description: Unique question version identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeCompleted
columns.description: Date/time when the question was completed (UTC). No data is provided for question pools or sections. Field can be null.

columns.name: QuestionNumber
columns.description: Question number in the quiz. Field can be null.

columns.name: Comment
columns.description: Feedback left by instructor. Field can be null.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Order in which quiz questions appear in the user interface. This also accounts for the ordering of sections (question numbers are null for sections).

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Score the user received for the answer. Field can be null.

columns.name: Page
columns.description: Page the question appeared on when the user took the quiz

columns.name: SectionId
columns.description: Unique section identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique global identifier of the question object.

columns.name: OutOf
columns.description: The denominator of the quiz score. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeStarted
columns.description: Quiz attempt start date and time (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: IsBonus
columns.description: Indicates if the question is a bonus question. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the answer is deleted.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date and time when the question answer was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: Id of the user or task who last modified the question.

columns.name: QuizTimeCompleted
columns.description: Date and time a quiz attempt was completed (UTC).

ReleaseConditionObjects.name: ReleaseConditionObjects
ReleaseConditionObjects.description: The Release Condition Objects Brightspace Data Set returns all the release conditions (prerequisites and results) that have been created in the organization.

columns.name: PreRequisiteId
columns.description: Unique pre-requisite identifier.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique result identifier.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique organization identifier.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Pre-requisite condition name.

columns.name: IsNegativeCondition
columns.description: Indicates if the condition relies on something not happening.

columns.name: PreRequisiteToolId
columns.description: Unique pre-requisite tool identifier.

columns.name: Id1
columns.description: Unique identifier for the pre-requisite tool. Field can be null.

columns.name: Id2
columns.description: Secondary unique identifier for the pre-requisite tool when needed. Field can be null.

columns.name: ResultToolId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the result tool.

columns.name: UsesPercentage
columns.description: Indicates if the pre-requisite is looking at a grade percentage.

columns.name: OperatorTypeDesc
columns.description: Defines where all or any of the pre-requisites need to be met. Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: Guid1
columns.description: Unique identifier for the pre-requisite tool. For a release condition object based on Outcomes, value will match the ObjectId of the Outcome.Field can be null

columns.name: Guid2
columns.description: Unique identifier for the pre-requisite tool. For a release condition object based on Outcomes, value will match the ScaleLevelId of the Outcome.Field can be null.

ReleaseConditionResults.name: ReleaseConditionResults
ReleaseConditionResults.description: The Release Condition Results Brightspace Data Set returns all the release condition results and whether they have been met for applicable users in the organization. These are the resulting actions that occur when pre-requisites are met.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique result identifier.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: Met
columns.description: Indicates whether the result has been met or not met by the user.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

RoleDetails.name: RoleDetails
RoleDetails.description: The Role Details Brightspace Data Set returns a full set of attributes for each role in your organization.

columns.name: RoleId
columns.description: Unique role identifier.

columns.name: RoleName
columns.description: Name of the role.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the role. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsCascading
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role cascades from other roles.

columns.name: InClassList
columns.description: Attribute indicating that users with this role appear in class lists.

columns.name: ClassListRoleName
columns.description: Attribute indicating the role name for users that appear in class lists. Field can be null.

columns.name: ClassListShowGroups
columns.description: Attribute indicating that members of this role can see groups consisting of learners in the class list.

columns.name: ClassListShowSections
columns.description: Attribute indicating that members of this role can see sections consisting of learners in the class list.

columns.name: ClassListDisplayRole
columns.description: Attribute indicating that members of this role appear in the class list with the role displayed.

columns.name: AccessInactiveCO
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role can access inactive course offerings.

columns.name: HasSpecialAccess
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role has special access to courses.

columns.name: AddToCourseOfferingGroups
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role appears in the course offering group.

columns.name: CanBeAutoEnrolledIntoGroups
columns.description: Attribute indicating that the role can be automatically enrolled into groups in a class.

columns.name: AddToCourseOfferingSections
columns.description: Attribute indicating that users with this role can be added to course offering sections.

columns.name: CanBeAutoEnrolledIntoSections
columns.description: Attribute indicating that users with this role can be automatically enrolled into course sections.

columns.name: AccessPastCourses
columns.description: Attribute indicating that this role can access past courses.

columns.name: AccessFutureCourses
columns.description: Attribute indicating that this role can access courses that have not yet started.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Indicates the sort order for users with this role.

columns.name: ShowInContent
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Content.

columns.name: ShowInDiscussionAssess
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Discussions assessments.

columns.name: ShowInDiscussionStats
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Discussions statistics.

columns.name: ShowInGrades
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Grades.

columns.name: ShowInAttendance
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in Attendance.

columns.name: AllowSelfEnrollInGroups
columns.description: Indicates that this role should have permission to self-enroll in groups.

columns.name: ShowInRegistration
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in registration information for a course.

columns.name: ShowInUserProgress
columns.description: Indicates that this role should appear in User Progress.

columns.name: RoleAlias
columns.description: Indicates the alias for this role. Field can be null.

columns.name: RoleCode
columns.description: Code assigned to each role for mapping to other systems or organizations. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date and time when the role was last modified (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: DeletedBy
columns.description: User identifier of the user that deleted the role. Field can be null.

RubricAssessment.name: RubricAssessment
RubricAssessment.description: The Rubric Assessment Brightspace Data Set returns rubric outcomes that are associated with a competency. Includes incomplete rubric assessments, which have a null LevelAchieved value.

columns.name: RubricId
columns.description: Unique rubric identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Rubric score. Field can be null.

columns.name: AssessedByUserId
columns.description: Rubric assessed by. Field can be null.

columns.name: AssessmentDate
columns.description: Date the rubric was assessed (UTC).

columns.name: IsCompleted
columns.description: Is rubric assessment complete.

columns.name: ActivityType
columns.description: Activity type associated with the rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: ActivityObjectId
columns.description: Identifier of the activity associated with the rubric. Field can be null.

columns.name: DateCreated
columns.description: Date rubric was created (UTC).

columns.name: AssessmentId
columns.description: Unique assessment ID.

columns.name: LevelAchievedId
columns.description: Unique rubric level achieved identifier. Field can be null.

RubricAssessmentCriteria.name: RubricAssessmentCriteria
RubricAssessmentCriteria.description: The Rubric Assessment Criteria Brightspace Data Set returns details for all rubric criteria in rubrics.

columns.name: AssessmentId
columns.description: Unique assessment ID

RubricsEdit.name: RubricsEdit
RubricsEdit.description: In the Rubrics Edit Brightspace Data Set, each row represents one element of a rubric that was changed by a permissioned user. If multiple elements are changed in the same rubric, multiple data rows will appear in the data set.

SCORMActivities.name: SCORMActivities
SCORMActivities.description: The SCORM Activities Brightspace Data Set describes the activities that exist in the SCORM package. Each activity will only be known after the first user, regardless of role, attempts it.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM activity.

columns.name: ScormObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each content object.

columns.name: ParentActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the parent activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: NumChildren
columns.description: Number of child activities of this activity.

columns.name: InternalId
columns.description: Unique label for the activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: The title of the activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: CompletionThreshold
columns.description: Used to determine when the activity is considered complete. Field can be null.

columns.name: PassingScore
columns.description: Scaled score required to pass the activity, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: PassingScoreUsed
columns.description: Whether the passing score was used to determine the learner success status. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreMin
columns.description: Minimum value in the range for the raw score in an activity attempt. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreMax
columns.description: Maximum value in the range for the raw score in an activity attempt. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity was last modified (UTC).

SCORMActivityAttempts.name: SCORMActivityAttempts
SCORMActivityAttempts.description: The SCORM Activity Attempts Brightspace Data Set lists each user attempt on each activity within a SCORM package, the completion status, success status, and time spent for each attempt.

columns.name: VisitId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM visit.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the activity.

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Number of the attempt on the objective.

columns.name: Completion
columns.description: The completion status of the learner in this attempt (UNKNOWN, COMPLETED, INCOMPLETE). Field can be null.

columns.name: Success
columns.description: The success status of the learner in this attempt (UNKNOWN, PASSED, FAILED). Field can be null.

columns.name: Score
columns.description: The score achieved by the learner in this attempt, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreRaw
columns.description: The raw score that the learner achieved in this attempt, between the min and max score of the activity. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeSpent
columns.description: The time the learner spent in this attempt, in seconds. Field can be null.

columns.name: Progress
columns.description: How much of the activity was completed in this attempt, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity attempt was last modified (UTC).

SCORMInteractionAttempts.name: SCORMInteractionAttempts
SCORMInteractionAttempts.description: The SCORM Interaction Attempts Brightspace Data Set lists the runtime interactions for each user on the activities they have attempted, including their response and time spent.

columns.name: VisitId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the visit.

columns.name: InteractionId

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Number of the attempt on the interaction.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the activity.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Point in time at which the interaction was first made available to the learner for learner interaction and response. Field can be null.

columns.name: Response
columns.description: Data generated when a learner responds to an interaction. Field can be null.

columns.name: Result
columns.description: Judgment of the correctness of the learner response (CORRECT, INCORRECT, UNANTICIPATED, NEUTRAL). Field can be null.

columns.name: NumericResult
columns.description: Numeric judgement of the correctness of the learner response. Field can be null.

columns.name: TimeSpent
columns.description: The time the learner spent in this attempt, in seconds. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the interaction attempt was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: ObjectiveId

columns.name: LastModified

SCORMInteractions.name: SCORMInteractions
SCORMInteractions.description: The SCORM Interactions Brightspace Data Set describes the runtime interactions that exist in each activity in the SCORM package. Each interaction will only be known after the first user, regardless of role, attempts it.

columns.name: InteractionId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the interaction.

columns.description: The type of interaction (UNDEFINED, TRUEFALSE, CHOICE, FILLIN, LONGFILLIN, LIKERT, MATCHING, PERFORMANCE, SEQUENCING, NUMERIC, OTHER).

columns.name: CorrectResponses

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity was last modified (UTC).

SCORMObjectiveAttempts.name: SCORMObjectiveAttempts
SCORMObjectiveAttempts.description: The SCORM Objective Attempts Brightspace Data Set outputs the score and completion information on every objective associated to the SCORM object where an attempt has been made.

columns.name: VisitId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM visit.

columns.name: ObjectiveId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the objective.

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Number of the attempt on the objective.

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Number that reflects the performance of the learner on this objective, scaled to between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreRaw
columns.description: Number that reflects the performance of the learner on this objective, relative to the min and max scores. Field can be null.

columns.name: Success
columns.description: Indicates whether the learner has mastered the objective (PASSED, FAILED, UNKNOWN). Field can be null.

columns.name: Completion

columns.name: Progress

columns.name: LastModified

SISCourseMergeLog.name: SISCourseMergeLog
SISCourseMergeLog.description: The SIS Course Merge Log Brightspace Data Set returns a list of attempts to merge or unmerge course offerings using the SIS Course Merge tool. This data set only captures data from July 2023 onwards.

SystemAccessLog.name: SystemAccessLog
SystemAccessLog.description: The System Access Log Brightspace Data Set captures each time a user accesses the system from the LMS via a browser (Brightspace), from the Pulse app (Pulse), or from the Brightspace Parent & Guardian mobile app (BPG-mobile). System access using Brightspace Parent & Guardian is represented in the data set twice: one where Source=Brightspace and one where Source=BPG-mobile. System access begins when the user logs in, returns after 30 minutes of inactivity, or opens the app. System access ends after 30 minutes of inactivity. Data from Brightspace and Pulse is available from September 2020 onwards. Data from Brightspace Parent & Guardian is only available from May 2022 onwards.

columns.name: SessionId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the session.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time in which the system access changed state.

columns.name: State
columns.description: Indicates whether a system access started or ended at the reported time.

columns.name: Source
columns.description: Source of the system access. Possible values:

columns.name: AppVersion
columns.description: Version of the app, where applicable. Field will be null for Brightspace sources.

columns.name: Device
columns.description: Device used in the system access. Field will be null for Brightspace sources.

columns.name: IsOfflineMode
columns.description: Indicates if a portion or all of the system access occurred offline with no internet connection. Field will be null for Brightspace sources.

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IP Address at which the event occurred. Field can be null.
