columns.description: UserId of user who submitted the assignment to TurnItIn. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastRefreshDate
columns.description: Most recent submission refresh time stamp (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Last time the submission was modified (UTC). Field can be null.

UserAttributeDefinitions.name: UserAttributeDefinitions
UserAttributeDefinitions.description: The User Attribute Definitions Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all defined user attributes in your organization. If no user attributes are defined for your organization, the data set will not generate.

columns.name: AttributeId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the attribute.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Display name for the attribute.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Indicates the type of data stored in the attribute. Can be one of "string", "date", "user", or "org_unit".

columns.name: AllowMultiple
columns.description: Indicates if multiple values are allowed for the attribute (TRUE - 1) or not (FALSE - 0).

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Indicates if the attribute is a default (TRUE - 1) or a custom attribute (FALSE - 0).

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date the attribute definition was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the attribute definition.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the attribute definition is deleted (TRUE - 1) or not (FALSE - 0).

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first.

UserAttributeValues.name: UserAttributeValues
UserAttributeValues.description: The User Attribute Values Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all values for all defined user attributes for each user in your organization. If no user attributes are defined for your organization, the data set will not generate.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user who the attribute is assigned to.

columns.name: AttributeId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the attribute.

columns.name: Value
columns.description: Value or list of values assigned to the user for the given attribute. Formatted as comma-separated values (CSV).

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date the attribute value was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the attribute value.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the attribute value is deleted (TRUE - 1) or not (FALSE - 0).

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which row occurred first.

UserEnrollments.name: UserEnrollments
UserEnrollments.description: The User Enrollments Brightspace Data Set returns a list of enrollments for all users in your organization.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier

columns.name: RoleName
columns.description: Role name

columns.name: EnrollmentDate
columns.description: Date enrolled (UTC)

columns.name: EnrollmentType
columns.description: Enrollment type. Field can be null.

columns.name: RoleId
columns.description: Unique role identifier

UserLogins.name: UserLogins
UserLogins.description: The User Logins Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all login attempts for your organization. The User Logins Brightspace Data Set contains data from 1 January 2021 onwards and adheres to the default system limit of 150 million rows of the most recent data.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier.

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: User name used to attempt log in.

columns.name: IP
columns.description: IP address

columns.name: SessionId
columns.description: Unique session identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: StatusType
columns.description: Login status

columns.name: AttemptDate
columns.description: Attempt date (UTC)

columns.name: ImpersonatingUserId
columns.description: User ID of impersonator. Field can be null.

columns.name: LoginAttemptId
columns.description: Unique login attempt identifier

columns.name: LoginSource
columns.description: The source of the login attempt, for example: Brightspace.

Users.name: Users
Users.description: The Users Brightspace Data Set returns a list of users in your organization. Version 4.10 / 5.4 adds a system user entry with UserId = 0 to this data set. The system user is only included in the full CSV.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique user identifier

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: User name

columns.name: OrgDefinedId
columns.description: Org defined ID. Field can be null.

columns.name: FirstName
columns.description: User's first name. If a preferred first name is provided, it is used. If not, the legal first name is used.

columns.name: MiddleName
columns.description: Middle name. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastName
columns.description: User's last name. If a preferred last name is provided, it is used. If not, the legal last name is used.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Is user active? Field can be null.

columns.name: Organization
columns.description: Organization name. Field can be null.

columns.name: ExternalEmail
columns.description: External email address. Field can be null.

columns.name: SignupDate
columns.description: Date the user was created in the system (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: FirstLoginDate
columns.description: Date when the user first logged in to the system (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the content in the row. Field can be null.

columns.name: OrgRoleId
columns.description: The unique role identifier for the role of the user at the org level. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastAccessed
columns.description: The date the user last accessed the system. If the user has never accessed the system, captures the date the user was created.

VirtualClassroomUsage.name: VirtualClassroomUsage
VirtualClassroomUsage.description: The Virtual Classroom Usage Brightspace Data Set returns information about how Virtual Classroom by Bongo is being used for Bongo Premium customers. The first data point is from July 1, 2018 and the data set will only appear for Bongo Premium customers if there is usage to retrieve. Note: The data includes all Virtual Classroom meetings that have ever been created. Cancelled meetings can be identified using the IsCancelled field, and do not appear in the LTI Links Brightspace Data Set. The Virtual Classroom UI only displays meetings that are scheduled to occur in the future, or have occurred and were recorded. Note: This data set is available as a FULL CSV containing all of the data and does not include a differential. Data is produced on a weekly basis, regardless of whether you purchased the hourly data freshness add-on. Since the data is owned by Bongo, data set generation is done on a region schedule and may not align to existing schedules.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier of the course where the meeting was scheduled. Will be null if the meeting was cancelled.

columns.name: CourseName
columns.description: The name of the course where the meeting was scheduled. Will be null if the meeting was cancelled.

columns.name: MeetingId
columns.description: Unique meeting identifier. If a meeting is reoccurring, each occurrence is represented in a new row.

columns.name: MeetingName
columns.description: The name of the Virtual Classroom meeting.

columns.name: CreationUserId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user who scheduled the meeting.

columns.name: CreationDate
columns.description: The date and time the meeting was created (UTC).

columns.name: ScheduledDate
columns.description: The date and time the meeting is scheduled to start (UTC).

columns.name: ScheduledDuration
columns.description: Planned length of the meeting in minutes.

columns.name: IsPublished
columns.description: Indicates if the option to automatically publish the recording to attendees is enabled.

columns.name: ExternalLinksEnabled
columns.description: Indicates if the option to use external links to join the meeting was enabled when the Virtual Classroom session was scheduled.

columns.name: WholeClassInvited
columns.description: Indicates if all users in an org unit were invited.

columns.name: IsCancelled
columns.description: Indicates if the meeting is cancelled. Comparable to IsDeleted in other data sets.

columns.name: StartDateTime
columns.description: The DateTime that the Virtual Classroom session was started (UTC). Will be null if the meeting was not started or canceled.

columns.name: EndDateTime
columns.description: The DateTime that the Virtual Classroom session was ended (UTC). Will be null if the meeting was not started or canceled.

columns.name: IsRecorded
columns.description: Indicates if the meeting was recorded.
